title: fried scallops and Sauternes beurre blanc
ingredients: 1 fennel bulb, cut into 1cm/½in thick slices, top fronds reserved for garnish
200g/7oz ready-made puff pastry, rolled to 5mm/¼in thick
salt and freshly ground black pepper
6 hand-dived scallops, shells removed, corals separated
salt and freshly ground black pepper
